NAME: Welcome to Google Summer of Code 2017
AUTHOR: aquadran

BODY.p: We are happy to announce that we are participating in this year's Google Summer of Code under the umbrella of our sister project ScummVM.
Have a look at the list of ideas or bring your own idea!
If you want to participate or have questions about GSoC, come talk to us on IRC Freenode channels #residualvm or #scummvm.
